inspirojis.quote: Politics is not an exact science.
inspirojis.author: Otto von Bismark

inspirojis.quote: Never to lie is to have no lock on your door, you are never wholly alone.
inspirojis.author: Elizabeth Bowen

inspirojis.quote: If I ever have sex with someone I might be able to develop a sense of humor.
inspirojis.author: Kate Beckinsale

inspirojis.quote: Architecture is not an inspirational business, it's a rational procedure to do sensible and hopefully beautiful things that's all.
inspirojis.author: Harry Seidler

inspirojis.quote: Before Nelson Mandela was arrested in 1962, he was an angry, relatively young man. He founded the ANC's military wing. When he was released, he surprised everyone because he was talking about reconciliation and forgiveness and not about revenge.
inspirojis.author: Desmond Tutu

inspirojis.quote: Year by year we are learning that in this restless, strenuous American life of ours vacations are essential.
inspirojis.author: Ellsworth Huntington

inspirojis.quote: The ultimate lesson all of us have to learn is unconditional love, which includes not only others but ourselves as well.
inspirojis.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

inspirojis.quote: Hey, I'm a Catholic deer hunter, I am happy to be clinging to my guns and my religion.
inspirojis.author: Paul Ryan

inspirojis.quote: People say that money is not the key to happiness, but I always figured if you have enough money, you can have a key made.
inspirojis.author: Joan Rivers

inspirojis.quote: A great photograph is one that fully expresses what one feels, in the deepest sense, about what is being photographed.
inspirojis.author: Ansel Adams

inspirojis.quote: Colloquial poetry is to the real art as the barber's wax dummy is to sculpture.
inspirojis.author: Ezra Pound

inspirojis.quote: Seeing that a Pilot steers the ship in which we sail, who will never allow us to perish even in the midst of shipwrecks, there is no reason why our minds should be overwhelmed with fear and overcome with weariness.
inspirojis.author: John Calvin

inspirojis.quote: Open the way before the new government to prove that it is for serving the people.
inspirojis.author: Muqtada al Sadr

inspirojis.quote: When it's said and done, the one thing I want to leave on this earth is hope. I have felt hopelessness, and it's a terrible feeling. Hopelessness will destroy you. I want to bring hope to other people.
inspirojis.author: Paula Deen

inspirojis.quote: It was the experience of mystery - even if mixed with fear - that engendered religion.
inspirojis.author: Albert Einstein

inspirojis.quote: The strong man is the one who is able to intercept at will the communication between the senses and the mind.
inspirojis.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

inspirojis.quote: Accordingly, it is our task to ensure that the Government formulates policies that foster the continued development of the IT sector while also providing for citizens' access to technology and opportunity for economic advancement.
inspirojis.author: Tim Holden

inspirojis.quote: I would go out with women my age, but there are no women my age.
inspirojis.author: George Burns

inspirojis.quote: My brother Jim and I spent many wonderful summers working on dairy farms in Wisconsin owned by Mom's cousins, and as members of our local Boy Scout troop.
inspirojis.author: Peter Agre

inspirojis.quote: We hope that, when the insects take over the world, they will remember with gratitude how we took them along on all our picnics.
inspirojis.author: Bill Vaughan
